quote: Hiding from the camera means hiding from clients.
why_clipworthy: This statement succinctly captures the importance of overcoming camera shyness for business growth.
suggested_hook: Are you hiding from your clients without even realizing it?

quote: I've tripled my speaking engagements and quadrupled my inbound leads by showing up on camera.
why_clipworthy: Concrete numbers demonstrate the tangible benefits of being active on video.
suggested_hook: Want to quadruple your leads? Here's how video can help.
